section.title: Trentino Features and Roadmap
section.para: The following features are supported by Trentino 0.2:

listitem.para: A Subset of the Service component Architecture including the SCA assembly model.
Lifecycle methods for proper initialization and removal of components
Dependency injection: all component dependencies are automatically injected by the runtime
A default SCA Binding based on the SOAP Protocol and Google Protocol Buffers for message serialization
